name: cenode
description: A pure JavaScript implementation of the ITA project's CEStore - called CENode. CENode is able to understand the basic sentence types parsed by the CEStore, such as conceptualising and instance creation.
author: Will Webberley & Alun Preece

scripts.build-web: babel src -d lib && webpack --config .webpackrc.js && mv dist/CENode.js dist/cenode.js && mv dist/CEModels.js dist/models.js && uglifyjs dist/cenode.js --mangle -o dist/cenode.min.js --source-map dist/cenode.js.map
